name: Bit.ly
description: bit.ly allows users to shorten, share, and track links (URLs). Reducing the URL length makes sharing easier. bit.ly can be accessed through our website, bookmarklets and a robust and open API. bit.ly is also integrated into several popular third-party tools such as Tweetdeck. A more full list of third party tools can be found on the bit.ly blog. Unique user-level and aggregate links are created, allowing users to view complete, real-time traffic and referrer data, as well as location and metadata. Tracking stats are available after users shorten their long links with bit.ly by clicking on the “Info+” link on bit.ly, or just adding a “+”u009d sign to the end of any bit.ly link (for example, http://bit.ly/n0og+).

apis.name: bitly Data API Search
apis.description: Welcome to the bitly API! If you're looking to shorten links, bundle links, or retrieve link-level or user-level analytics programmatically, you've come to the right place.  The bitly API allows developers to shorten links, bundle links, or retrieve link-level or user-level analytics programmatically, you've come to the right place. Utilize bitly's new
functionality, save and edit links as bitmarks and pull in bitmarks from an authenticated user's social netwo
